author: Chris Keiser

review: Bought this straight from Google when they offered it with the free netflix. At first it was upsetting with the limited options of media to stream but since the SDK was released and more companies were able to access it, more apps came out. I use this in every possible way, Netflix, Hulu, Google Music and more recently, Plex for my own personal media. Additionally, there are many other uses for it such as for gaming with friends. QCast and 4pics 1 word are example games to check out. This dongle has a tremendous amount of potential and I'm glad I invested in it.I love the fact that my cell phone is my remote control. I am also able to turn my TV on and off including volume controls with my phone with it being an S4 it's convenient. As a roku owner, this is just all around better in my opinion. Some people expect so much, but sometimes... simplicity is best.
